resources.string: 1、Unable to install apps or click buttons.

This is a restriction for floating window function on Android for security considerations. In this case,you should switch off the filter temporarily through the switch on notification bar or home page,and when completing the operation,you can switch on the filter.

There are some issues on system permissions because some manufacturers make deep customization of the native Android system. 
1、Cannot detect whether a permission has been granted or not such as whitelist permission. 
2、Cannot jump to the settings page to grant permissions.In this case, please enter the settings page and grant permissions manually. 
3、Permission name is not the same on mobiles made of different manufacturers,for example whitelist permission, is called 'Protect Apps' on Huawei EMUI while 'Manage apps' battery usage' on Xiaomi MIUI.
You can send email to us through the feedback function or the third party mailbox if you find any other problems, and we will deal with it as soon as possible. Thank you for your support!
